ValueContextForInputValidation - Interface in com.orchestranetworks.instance

ValueContextForUpdate - Interface in com.orchestranetworks.service

ValueContextForValidation - Interface in com.orchestranetworks.instance

ValueContextForValidationOnRecord - Interface in com.orchestranetworks.instance

ValueContextForValidationOnTable - Interface in com.orchestranetworks.instance
This interface provides the services for accessing the content of a table and for adding validation messages in the context of a validation process.
